On August 28, 2025, Hindustan Unilever (HINDUNILVR) issued a Postal Ballot Notice seeking shareholder approval for the appointment of Ms. Priya Nair as the new Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer . Ms. Nair's appointment had been previously announced in July, with an effective date of August 1, 2025.

The company also published the following business updates on its official website on August 28, 2025:

"Partner to Win" program: HUL highlighted its flagship "Partner to Win" (PTW) program, which aims to improve collaboration with suppliers and partners on innovation, sustainability, and growth.

Sunsilk relaunch: An article detailed the relaunch of the Sunsilk brand, which aimed to refresh its identity to resonate with a new generation of consumers.
